name: SpellAssist
0:
”Alexa, open spell assist”
”Spell discombobulated slowly”
”Spell reign with hints”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: spell assist
des: Just say “open spell assist” to open the application. There are three ways you can ask the application to spell the word: normally, slowly or with hints. Ask Spell Assist to either “spell {word}”, “spell {word} slowly” or “spell {word} with hints.” You can ask spell assist to repeat the spelling or ask the skill to spell another word with the same prompts. Spell away!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
